channel.title: Oncology | Nunez Lab for Computational Mental Health & Cancer Care

item.title: Predicting the Survival of Patients With Cancer From Their Initial Oncology Consultation Document Using Natural Language Processing
item.description: This study demonstrates that natural language processing applied to initial oncology consultation documents can effectively predict patient survival outcomes across multiple cancer types. The models perform comparably with or better than previous prediction models while using readily available clinical data.
